resources.string: The monkey is hungry! To feed him, try to catch the good food. The monkey likes all kinds of fruits and will reward you with points if you eat them. But be carefull, the monkey will punish you if the fruit hits the ground. He will do this by removing one life, which you only have three of.
The monkey hates scary creatures, like spiders and snakes! Try to avoid them to keep the monkey happy. If you catch one of them, he will punish you by take some points from you.

Once in a while a bug will appear on the screen. The monkey think bugs are interesting, but are unsure about what happens if he eats one. The only thing he know is that the bugs will affect him in a positive way â€“ try to eat them!
